list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a fluid, gas, or electricity) move along or out steadily and continuously in a current or stream.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: from here the river flows north
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Từ đây sông chảy về phía bắc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: go from one place to another in a steady stream, typically in large numbers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the firm is hoping the orders will keep flowing in
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công ty đang hy vọng các đơn đặt hàng sẽ tiếp tục chảy trong

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a solid) undergo a permanent change of shape under stress, without melting.
the action or fact of moving along in a steady, continuous stream.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the flow of water into the pond

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a steady, continuous stream of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she eased the car into the flow of traffic
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nới lỏng chiếc xe vào dòng chảy của giao thông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the gradual permanent deformation of a solid under stress, without melting.
